content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Boiler at position (-13.5, 20.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler (position (-13.5, 20.0))

### Electricity Group
Consists of the following entities:
- Small electric pole at position (-15.5, 19.5)
- Small electric pole at position (-15.5, 18.5)
- Small electric pole at position (-15.5, 21.5)
- Small electric pole at position (-13.5, 5.3)

### Lab at position (-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position (-17.5, 23.5))

### Assembling Machine at position (-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position (-21.5, 25.5))

### Pipe Groups
Consists of the following entities:
- PipeGroup (position (-4.5, 21.5))
- PipeGroup (position (-4.5, 23.5))

### Copper Plate Mine at position (-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position (-18.0, -49.0)) and a furnace (position (-18.0, -49.0))

### Copper Plate Factory at position (5.0, -73.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position (5.0, -73.0)) and a furnace (position (5.0, -73.0))

### Electricity Generator at position (-10.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position (-10.0, 0.0))

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting entities to power sources
- Ensure that the entities you are connecting (like the lab and assembling machine) are within the power range of the electric poles. Check the positions of the poles to confirm they can supply power.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check for existing entities in the target position.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors related to unpowered entities
- Verify that all entities requiring power (like the lab and assembling machine) are connected to a power source and that the power source is operational.
